governing_standards: ESRS E1 - Climate Change

phase_in_reliefs.relief: Value chain GHG data from external partners

company_applicability.scope_note: Minimum coverage: EU operations; group-level preferred

key_disclosures: E1-1: Transition plan for climate change mitigation
E1-2: Policies related to climate change mitigation and adaptation
E1-3: Actions and resources for climate change mitigation and adaptation
E1-4: Targets related to climate change mitigation and adaptation
E1-5: Energy consumption and mix (MWh by source, % renewables, intensity ratio)
E1-6: Gross Scope 1, 2 (market-based and location-based), and Scope 3 GHG emissions (tCO2e per category)
E1-7: GHG removals and carbon credits (tCO2e, registry, vintage)
E1-8: Internal carbon price (EUR/tCO2e, scope of application)
E1-9: Anticipated financial effects of climate-related physical and transition risks (EUR)

E2-5: Substances of concern (SoC) and substances of very high concern (SVHC) — kg/tonnes released
E2-6: Anticipated financial effects of pollution-related risks and opportunities (EUR)

S1-3: Processes to remediate negative impacts and channels to raise concerns
S1-4: Action plans and resources on material impacts on own workforce
S1-5: Targets related to managing material impacts on own workforce

S1-7: Non-employee worker characteristics (contractors, agency workers)

S1-9: Diversity metrics: gender by management level (%), age distribution (%)

S1-11: Social protection coverage (%) by country
S1-12: Employees with disabilities (%)
S1-13: Training metrics (avg hours/employee/year; % covered by training; types of training)
S1-14: Health and safety metrics (TRIR per 200,000 hrs; lost-time injury rate; fatalities; work-related ill health cases)
S1-15: Work-life balance: parental leave take-up rate by gender (%)
S1-16: Compensation: CEO pay ratio; gender pay gap (%)

ISSA 5000 - International Standard on Sustainability Assurance (IAASB, forthcoming)

Management representation letters
Audit trails linking reported figures to source systems and data owners

areas: Data quality controls: completeness checks, outlier detection thresholds, gap estimation methodology and triggers

Scope boundary definitions: consolidation approach (operational control / financial control / equity share) and rationale

Escalation and restatement procedures: criteria for prior period corrections and mandatory disclosure of restatements per ESRS 1 Section 6
